tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Preferences (
  preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  cuisine_type VARCHAR(50),
  diet_restrictions VARCHAR(100),
  fav_foods VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE Recipes (
  recipe_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  cuisine_type VARCHAR(50),
  ingredients TEXT[],
  instructions TEXT[],
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Food_Preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    favorite_fruits VARCHAR,
    favorite_vegetables VARCHAR,
    favorite_protein VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Recipes (
    recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_name VARCHAR,
    ingredients VARCHAR,
    instructions TEXT,
    difficulty_level VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Meal_Plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    week_number INT,
    day_of_week VARCHAR,
    recipe_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Food_Preferences(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES Recipes(recipe_id)
)

CREATE TABLE AI_Models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR,
    model_type VARCHAR,
    trained_on_data VARCHAR,
    accuracy DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Recipes (
    recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_name VARCHAR(100),
    cuisine_type VARCHAR(50),
    ingredients ARRAY(VARCHAR(50)),
    instructions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);
